duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide ongoing training and feedback to staff and interns.
Assist in portfolio monitoring with investment professionals.
Review quarterly investment report valuations, including diversification metrics and valuation gains and losses.
Prepare documentation for quarterly investor reports and performance returns at a portfolio and fund level.
Understand complex fund vehicles and structures.
Prepare analysis of valuation changes and drivers across portfolio investments.
Process investment amendments/consents with investment professionals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field (Master's preferred)
